Title: Requires slow-moving traffic, trucks, buses, and other certain vehicles use the right two lanes of a multilane roadway
Summary: Requires slow-moving traffic, trucks, buses, and other certain vehicles use the right two lanes of a multilane roadway and requires all lanes other than the right most two lanes on a multilane highway to be marked with "NO TRUCKS OR BUSES".

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the highway law, in relation to requiring slow-moving traffic, trucks, buses, and other certain vehicles use the right two lanes of a multilane roadway
